/usr/bin/c++    -W -Wall -pedantic -Wno-non-virtual-dtor -Wno-long-long -Wwrite-strings -Wpointer-arith -Woverloaded-virtual -Wno-variadic-macros -Wshadow -pipe -DG4USE_STD11 -std=c++11     CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/exampleB2a.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2ActionInitialization.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2TrackerSD.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2EventAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2TrackerHit.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2PrimaryGeneratorAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2aDetectorMessenger.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2RunAction.cc.o CMakeFiles/exampleB2a.dir/src/B2aDetectorConstruction.cc.o  -o exampleB2a -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libG4Tree.so /usr/local/lib/libG4GMocren.so /usr/local/lib/libG4visHepRep.so /usr/local/lib/libG4RayTracer.so /usr/local/lib/libG4VRML.so /usr/local/lib/libG4OpenGL.so /usr/local/lib/libG4gl2ps.so /usr/local/lib/libG4interfaces.so /usr/local/lib/libG4persistency.so /usr/local/lib/libG4analysis.so /usr/local/lib/libG4error_propagation.so /usr/local/lib/libG4readout.so /usr/local/lib/libG4physicslists.so /usr/local/lib/libG4parmodels.so /usr/local/lib/libG4FR.so /usr/local/lib/libG4vis_management.so /usr/local/lib/libG4modeling.so -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lXmu /usr/local/lib/libG4run.so /usr/local/lib/libG4event.so /usr/local/lib/libG4tracking.so /usr/local/lib/libG4processes.so /usr/local/lib/libG4zlib.so -lexpat /usr/local/lib/libG4digits_hits.so /usr/local/lib/libG4track.so /usr/local/lib/libG4particles.so /usr/local/lib/libG4geometry.so /usr/local/lib/libG4materials.so /usr/local/lib/libG4graphics_reps.so /usr/local/lib/libG4intercoms.so /usr/local/lib/libG4global.so /usr/local/lib/libG4clhep.so -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:
